definitions.definition: a clever and pithy spoken witticism.
examples: joke, witticism, quip, jest, sally; Morepun, bon mot; informalcrack, gag, funny, one-liner, zinger "her parents were not amused by Lenny's wisecracks"Morepun, bon mot; crack, gag, funny, one-liner, zinger her parents were not amused by Lenny's wisecracks
his warmth, boisterousness, and constant wisecracking
